column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////After a pitcher of the fantastic berry sangria and many shared plates we were very satisfied with the food and overall experience. And finally the icing on the cake
column2: our server brought out about 7 or 8 of the small desserts for us on the house as well as removing the sangria and a couple of the tapas from our bill to make up for our delay in seating. That was honestly the best customer service and superb recovery I've ever received
column3: they actually care about the customers! So pleased with everything
column4: I will definitely be returning very soon.
